LanguageData.Apparello_Moron.label: Kettlehat
LanguageData.Apparello_Moron.description: A helmet with a large metal brim for extra protection; favored by peasant but seen as unfit for nobility.
LanguageData.MedievalArmor_NasalHelmet.label: Nasal Helmet
LanguageData.MedievalArmor_NasalHelmet.description: A simple helmet with a slight innovation: a bar that extended down over the nose, provding better protection to the face but somewhat obscuring vision.
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalKing.label: Horned Cap
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalKing.description: A decorated, hardened leather cap. Often worn by the most revered and skilled combatants of Norbal communities.
